title: Thresh and Relic Shield
body: Why cant thresh last hit minions(at more than his aa damage is) to get gold and heal their teammate like other supports can?

replies.body: Because he is ranged. Read the item before you question why it doesn't work.
Seriously riot should delete any thread with the words "thresh" and "relic shield" at this point.
Why the fuck do people keep getting that wrong...
Because he doesn't seem a ranged attack at all, Thresh attacks are like Sejuani's but with more range.
Meanwhile Kayle is hitting you from a distance by swinging a sword and nobody is surprised about her using a Runaans :P
And then there's Poppy's passive Buckler toss, which still executes I am pretty sure.

She needs to have E activated and it still doesn't make sense, she's still using her sword.

Thresh doesn't become melee if he attacks you when is close (he changes the AA animation).
that would be kinda cool actually

Relic shield only executes on melee attacks. Despite the weird nature of thresh autos (they actually bypass wind wall, like kayle autos), they are still ranged.

Any kills from any source can trigger relic shield without the execute, which is actually pretty funny on champs like galio, since it lets him help waveclear with Q.

> Despite the weird nature of thresh autos (they actually bypass wind wall, like kayle autos), they are still ranged.

The behaviour of his autoattacks is actually rather consistent; they bypass Windwall because they are not projectiles.

Similar autoattacks would be:

* Vel'koz
* Azir
* Viktor (Q)
* Kayle (E)

Execute is melee only.

Thresh is ranged.

Read the bloody tooltips.
He can give the healing and gold. He just needs to last hit since he is ranged and the execute on relic is melee only.
thresh isnt a melee support he is a ranged support
